content.en: Tumor Mutation Prediction: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to predict tumor mutation burden, develop prognostic models, and identify therapeutic options for hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC), a type of liver cancer. They have utilized various algorithms such as the ESTIMATE algorithm, COX regression analysis, Lasso regression analysis, CIBERSORT algorithm, and gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) to analyze data from databases like The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) and the International Cancer Genome Consortium (ICGC). These studies aim to improve the prognosis and treatment of HCC by leveraging the power of algorithms and computational analysis.
content.da: Tumor Mutation Prediction: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige tumor mutationsbyrde, udvikle prognostiske modeller og identificere terapeutiske muligheder for hepatocellulært carcinom (HCC), en type leverkræft. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer som ESTIMATE algoritmen, COX regressionsanalyse, Lasso regressionsanalyse, CIBERSORT algoritmen og gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) til at analysere data fra databaser som The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) og International Cancer Genome Consortium (ICGC). Disse studier sigter mod at forbedre prognosen og behandlingen af HCC ved at udnytte styrken af algoritmer og computeranalyser.
